slave
Class RemoteUltrasonicPoller

java.lang.Object
  slave.RemoteUltrasonicPoller

public class RemoteUltrasonicPoller
extends java.lang.Object

This class serves as a higher level abstraction of a ultrasonic sensor. It is wrapped in a poller class which will now handle the returned values and the polling of that sensor

Nested Class Summary
 class RemoteUltrasonicPoller.CenterUS
          Call pingsUS(center) in the RemoteUltrasonicPoller.CenterUS thread.
 class RemoteUltrasonicPoller.LeftUS
          Call pingsUS(left) in the RemoteUltrasonicPoller.LeftUS thread.
 class RemoteUltrasonicPoller.RightUS
          Call pingsUS(right) in the RemoteUltrasonicPoller.RightUS thread.
static class RemoteUltrasonicPoller.USPosition
          Has values for the 3 (left, center, right) positions of the ultrasonic sensors.
static class RemoteUltrasonicPoller.USPState
          The various modes of the ultrasonic poller

Constructor Detail

RemoteUltrasonicPoller

public RemoteUltrasonicPoller()
Initializes the 3 ultrasonic sensors

Sets default pollRate to 20

Turns the ultrasonic Sensors off

Initializes the threads for the Ultrasonic sensors

Sets default state to PING_CENTER

Method Detail

setUSPState

public void setUSPState(RemoteUltrasonicPoller.USPState state)
Sets the mode of the ultrasonic poller to the corresponding state passed

Parameters:
state -

timedOut

public void timedOut()
Pings the ultrasonic sensors based on which mode the poller is set to and stores their corresponding values. Puts them into the readings array

start

public void start()
Starts this instance of the ultrasonic poller Stop must be called to stop the reading again.

resetUSP

public void resetUSP()
Resets the ultrasonic sensor values to the default -1 values. The ultrasonic sensor will never return negative values during normal operation. Stops the polling during this operation to avoid overwriting good data.

isSetup

public boolean isSetup()
Checks if the ultrasonic sensor has collected at least 5 values. It does this by checking for any negative numbers in the readings.

stop

public void stop()
Stops this instance of the ultrasonic poller Start must be called to start reading again.

getUSReading

public int getUSReading(int sensor)
Returns the filtered data for the sensor (median filtering)

Parameters:
sensor -
Returns:

getLowestReading

public int getLowestReading()
gets the lowest reading in the ultrasonicPoller at that time. Readings are not taken temporarily as they are not needed;

Returns:
The smallest reading of the last 5 polls.

getLowestSensor

public RemoteUltrasonicPoller.USPosition getLowestSensor()
This method gets the number representation of the US with the lowest value out of all the ultrasonic sensor. So if the center has the lowest reading, the USPosition.CENTER will be returned

pingUS

private void pingUS(int sensor)
Pings ultrasonic sensor and records the result in readings

addReading

private void addReading(int sensor,
                        int reading)
Helper method to add a new reading to the readings array. The new reading will be store in the 0th index.

Parameters:
sensor - The sensor value (0 for left, 1 for center, 2 for right).
reading - The value to insert.

computeAverage

public int computeAverage(int sensor)
Computes the average values read by a sensor

Parameters:
sensor - The integer value corresponding to the ultrasonic sensor
Returns:
The average integer value, in integer value.
